entry.title: $2375 // Renovated 1 bedroom on top floor
entry.content:
Located at 108th and Broadway this beautifully renovated one bedroom co-op will be the first and last apartment on your tour. The building is super packed with amenities, including a lounge with a full size pool table, a communal kitchen, a relaxing backyard garden and a full laundry room. This elevator building also features a helpful live-in Super.
Situated in one of the most vibrant areas on the Upper West Side, walking distance to Columbia and near such neighborhood favorites as Henry's, Absolute Bagels, Sliver Moon Bakery and West Side Market.
Building is also located with easy access to both Riverside and Central Parks, M104 and M106 buses and minutes from 1 train at 110th St.

Available for rent April 1, 2019
